bio: Open Source DevRel | Founder of **EddieHub** and [BioDrop](https://biodrop.io) | **GitHub** Star

events.name: WeAreDevelopers World Congress
events.description: SHAPING THE FUTURE TOGETHER. Every year, we are dedicated to bringing together software developers and tech decision-makers from all around the globe to discuss and learn about the latest trends and innovations shaping our world.

events.name: Infobip Shift Conference
events.description: This is not another developer event. This is an experience that brings together the global tech community for two days of learning, networking, and creating new memories. This is a gathering of professionals, founders, leaders, disruptors, and dreamers. This is Infobip Shift. And we want to Shift Your World.

links.name: YouTube: Learn more about Open Source

milestones.title: GitHub Star
milestones.description: Became a **GitHub** Star for the first year of the program

milestones.title: Started Open Source project BioDrop
milestones.description: Connecting your audience with a single link: this project started on a YouTube livestream

milestones.title: BioDrop to a SAAS platform
milestones.description: Have advanced premium features, but will always be free and open source

name: Eddie Jaoude

testimonials.title: Eddie === Open Source
testimonials.description: it's difficult to describe in such a few words what Eddie has done and he is doing for the Developer community. The passion he transmits online is 1/10 of the one he transmits live, and meeting him and having the first collaboration on Youtube in 2020 was a great moment. I wish him and Sara the best for the future and to geek out as much as possible. Eddie === Open Source

testimonials.title: A true Eddlian
testimonials.description: Eddie, the founder of the EddieHub community, is a true leader in the tech industry. He founded the successful BioDrop project and served as an incredible mentor to those around him. He has a unique ability to share his knowledge and experience in an approachable and impactful way. His guidance and support have significantly and positively impacted my career. I highly recommend Eddie as a mentor, leader, and community builder. He is an asset to any organization or project.

cleanBio: Open Source DevRel | Founder of EddieHub and BioDrop | GitHub Star
